article: How are you, Lin? I'm writing  _  you at my school. It's a big middle  _  . I'm in a big class. There're fifty students in my class. There are about two hundred teachers in my school. My English teacher  _  Miss Liu.  _  is a nice teacher. We go to school  _  Monday to Friday. There are four classes in the morning and two in the afternoon. We play games  _  four on Friday after class. I have some friends at school. One is  from  America. She speaks English and  /  Chinese. I like to play  _  them. We  play  football. That's my favorite game.
